summary: Adds a \'player owned\' bedroll to the lower level of the Bards College, its placed along the wall across from the foot of the lower level members beds.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

Adds a \'player owned\' bedroll to the lower level of the Bards College, its placed along the wall across from the foot of the lower level members beds.

That\'s literally all this does so as to be of minimal impact and compatibility.


Details:

Player can use this at any time, I didn\'t bother adding quest completion requirements as I have self control and only use it once I have completed \"Tending the Flames\", it also does not give anything but the basic rested bonus, I started to look at fixing that then on consideration it\'s a manky old flea ridden bedroll on a cold stone slab floor, how well could you possibly rest on it?


Version History:

v1.0 - Repack as stand-along initial release.
author: Badmagic
